revised_title: Obituary of Dr. Sibson: A Pioneering Physician and Medical Researcher
tldr: The article is an obituary for Dr. Sibson, a renowned physician and medical researcher who made significant contributions to the fields of respiratory physiology, medical anatomy, and anesthesia. His work on the mechanical physiology of respiration, diagnosis of chest diseases, and the development of an anaesthesia mask greatly impacted the medical community during his lifetime.
